headline: BAE Systems awarded $500 million contract for Paladin Self-Propelled Howitzers
summary: BAE Systems (LON: BA) received a contract award valued at more than $500 million to produce additional M109A7 Paladin Self-Propelled Howitzers and M992A3 Ammunition Carriers for the U.S. Army.

headline: BAE Systems delivers 100,000th APKWS® laser-guidance kit
summary: BAE Systems (LON: BA) recently delivered its 100,000th APKWS® laser-guidance kit, marking a major production milestone as it continues providing U.S. armed forces and allies with low-cost, reliable precision munitions.

headline: The Boeing Company’s (BA) 777-9 Flight Training Simulators Receives Qualification Certification
summary: The Boeing Company (NYSE:BA) is one of the Best Aerospace and Defense Stocks to Invest In Right Now. On February 19, The Boeing Company (NYSE:BA) announced that its 777-9 flight training simulators received qualification certificates from the US Federal Aviation Administration and European Union Aviation Safety Agency. headline: BAE Systems Electromagnetic Attack Breakthrough And What It May Mean For BA
summary: BAE Systems (LSE:BA) has worked with the U.S. Air Force on a new modular electromagnetic attack system. The company recently showed the system operating across different defense platforms using rapid prototyping. The technology is designed to be customizable and relatively affordable for a range of electronic warfare applications. BAE Systems is a major defense technology supplier, with electronic warfare a key part of its portfolio alongside combat aircraft systems, cyber, and intelligence...
